article:
AMERICA'S first daughters, Malia and Sasha, are excited about getting a pet dog. But their father, President Obama, has told the girls they have to pick up the poop  _ the grass. It's true. Keeping a dog _ lots of other work besides(...) picking up the poop. For example, you'd better know _ the dog goes to bed and how it lives happily. It means you have to know the animals' _ and be ready.
Li Hui, 15, of Beijing, once kept a rabbit and some goldfish. _ all of them died. "My rabbit ate the wrong food," said Li. "My _ died because they ate too much!"
Xiao Ting, 15, of Shanghai, wanted to keep a dog a year ago. She got food and a new doghouse ready to _ the dog, but she only kept the dog for one day. "I _ thought a dog could be so active. It wouldn't stop barking . My father had to walk _ at 3 o'clock in the morning!"
"You'd better think it is like your _ . " said Liu Yining, a 14-year-old  Beijinger. She is a (an) _  pet keeper. Her family has kept a dog named Pipi for three years. _ Pipi first came to Liu's home, it made her house dirty everywhere. It took a long time to teach Pipi to go to the toilet. She talks and plays with Pipi a lot. She really  cares about Pipi.
 Keeping a pet means you have to be patient and caring.
